translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽. The Chapter about the Seat in the Water
“When the Lord of the World had attained Nibbāna,
the one who sees what is beneficial, the Lord of Men,
I made a world-realm for me,
at the supreme Thūpa of the Buddha.
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of the world-realm.
I have done what the Buddha asked.”🔽Thus the elder Jagatikāraka recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā jagatikārako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Jagatikārakattherassāpadānaṁ navamaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā jagatikārakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati 🔽jagatikāraka ttherassa apadānam navama
translated: The Elder Jagatikāraka’s Birth Story is the ninth.
